body: Because his tankoubons are published through Wani Magazine, that means they are instantly DMCAed off panda when they are posted, the place where nhentai steals everything from, that and also fakku already has published some of his work too which also is infamous to DMCA stuff hard online to anyone daring to reupload their stuff https://www.fakku.net/artists/hiyoshi-hana  , that aside for those that wish to follow me on what other doujin I may working on next and/or see when I release something new without waiting along many other thing, you can join my server discord.gg/8g4WSBdHuG
I love this artist work, but for some reason most of his originals works are untranslated check his tankoubon to see their pretty good, only his parodies are translated
